mapper.insert: insert into TBL_MEMBER (id, nickname, name, pwd, birthday, registerday, mobile, status, role) values (#{id}, #{nickname}, #{name}, #{pwd}, #{birthday}, default, #{mobile}, default, default)
mapper.select: select count(*) from TBL_MEMBER where id=#{id}
select count(*) from TBL_MEMBER where nickname=#{nickname}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (b_idx, id_fk, nickname, category_idx_fk, b_title, b_content, b_date, b_like, b_hit, b_status, c_cnt) values (b_idx.nextval, #{id_fk}, #{nickname}, #{category_idx_fk}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, default, 0, default, default, default)
mapper.select: select previousseq, previoussubject , b_idx, id_fk, nickname, category_idx_fk, b_title, b_content, b_hit, b_date, b_like, c_cnt , nextseq, nextsubject from ( select lag(b_idx,1) over(order by b_idx desc) AS previousseq , lag(b_title,1) over(order by b_idx desc) AS previoussubject , b_idx, id_fk, nickname, b_title, b_content, b_hit , to_char(b_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as b_date , b_like , c_cnt , category_idx_fk , lead(b_idx,1) over(order by b_idx desc) AS nextseq , lead(b_title,1) over(order by b_idx desc) AS nextsubject from tbl_board where b_status = 1 and category_idx_fk = #{category_idx} ) V where V.b_idx = #{b_idx}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set b_hit = b_hit + 1 where b_idx = #{b_idx}

select.if: select * from TBL_CATEGORY where category_idx not in(2,3,4,10)
select * from TBL_CATEGORY where category_idx in(2,3,4)

mapper.insert: insert into tbl_comment(c_idx, id_fk, b_idx_fk, nickname, c_content, c_date, c_status) values(c_idx.nextval, #{id_fk}, #{b_idx_fk}, #{nickname}, #{c_content}, default, default)

insert into tbl_comment(c_idx, id_fk, b_idx_fk, nickname, c_content, c_date, c_status, file_name, org_file_name, file_size) values(c_idx.nextval, #{id_fk}, #{b_idx_fk}, #{nickname}, #{c_content}, default, default, #{file_name}, #{org_file_name}, #{file_size})
mapper.update: update tbl_board set c_cnt = c_cnt + 1 where b_idx = #{b_idx_fk}
mapper.select: select nickname, c_content, to_char(c_date, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') AS c_date from tbl_comment where c_status = 1 and b_idx_fk = #{b_idx_fk} order by c_idx asc

select b_idx, id_fk, nickname, category_idx_fk, b_title, b_date, b_hit, c_cnt from ( select row_number() over(order by b_idx desc) AS rno, b_idx, id_fk, nickname, category_idx_fk, b_title, CASE WHEN to_char(b_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(#{sysdate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') THEN to_char(b_date, 'hh24:mi') ELSE to_char(b_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS b_date, b_hit, c_cnt from tbl_board where b_status = 1 and category_idx_fk = #{category_idx} ) V where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select b_idx, id_fk, nickname, category_idx_fk, b_title, b_date, b_hit, c_cnt from ( select row_number() over(order by b_hit desc) AS rno, b_idx, id_fk, nickname, category_idx_fk, b_title, CASE WHEN to_char(b_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(#{sysdate}, 'yyyy-MM-dd') THEN to_char(b_date, 'hh24:mi') ELSE to_char(b_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') END AS b_date, b_hit, c_cnt from tbl_board where b_status = 1 ) V where rno between #{startRno} and 20
mapper.delete: delete from TBL_LIKE where id_fk = #{id_fk} and b_idx_fk = #{b_idx_fk}
mapper.update: update tbl_board set b_like = b_like + 1 where b_idx = #{b_idx_fk}
update tbl_board set b_like = b_like - 1 where b_idx = #{b_idx_fk}
update tbl_board set c_cnt = c_cnt - 1 where b_idx = #{b_idx_fk}
mapper.select: select b_idx, id_fk, nickname, b_title, b_hit, c_cnt, category_idx_fk from ( select row_number() over(order by b_hit desc) AS rno, b_idx, id_fk, nickname, b_title, b_hit, c_cnt, category_idx_fk from tbl_board where b_status = 1) where rno between 1 and 14
